entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this morning. Wind becoming east 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
